title: Army Platoon vs Dinosaurs in 'Primitive War' Wild & Crazy Full Trailer
description: "My mission is to get my men home, not fight dinosaurs." Sparke Films & Rialto Distribution have debuted the full official trailer for a wild & crazy action thriller titled Primitive War, which is both a Vietnam War movie and a dinosaur movie all-in-one. "This ain't no walk in the park." This actually looks WAY bigger and better than it might seem, definitely not a B-movie, despite the possibility. Set in Vietnam in 1968. A recon unit known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. They soon discover they are not alone. There are dinosaurs of all kinds hiding out in this primordial valley. And it will take all they've got for them to make it out of there without becoming lunch. This dino action movie's cast has Ryan Kwanten, Jeremy Piven, Anthony Ingruber, Aaron Glenane, Tricia Helfer, Nick Wechsler, Ana Thu Nguyen, and Jake Ryan. Sparke states: "Dinosaurs in the Vietnam war? What's not to love about that concept?!" Now set for a theatrical release starting in August one month from now. This looks proper badass! They might've actually made a better Jurassic World movie. Fire […]

text: TRAILERS by July 26, 2025Source: YouTube "My mission is to get my men home, not fight dinosaurs." Sparke Films & Rialto Distribution have debuted the full official trailer for a wild & crazy action thriller titled Primitive War, which is both a Vietnam War movie and a dinosaur movie all-in-one. "This ain't no walk in the park." This actually looks WAY bigger and better than it might seem, definitely not a B-movie, despite the possibility. Set in Vietnam in 1968. A recon unit known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. They soon discover they are not alone. There are dinosaurs of all kinds hiding out in this primordial valley. And it will take all they've got for them to make it out of there without becoming lunch. This dino action movie's cast has Ryan Kwanten, Jeremy Piven, Anthony Ingruber, Aaron Glenane, Tricia Helfer, Nick Wechsler, Ana Thu Nguyen, and Jake Ryan. Sparke states: "Dinosaurs in the Vietnam war? What's not to love about that concept?!" Now set for a theatrical release starting in August one month from now. This looks proper badass! They might've actually made a better Jurassic World movie. Fire it up. Here's the main official trailer (+ poster) for Luke Sparke's movie Primitive War, direct from YouTube: You can rewatch the first teaser trailer for Luke Sparke's Primitive War right here for the first look again. Vietnam. 1968. A search and rescue team known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. As they hunt the primordial depths of the valley, they discover ancient horrors that not only threaten to unravel their minds, but they will end their lives as well. Dinosaurs have somehow been unleashed...! When the casualties mount, the men of Vulture Squad must abandon their human nature and give in to their savage instincts in order to survive…the Primitive War. Primitive War is directed by B-movie genre filmmaker Luke Sparke, director of the movies Red Billabong, Occupation, Occupation: Rainfall, Devil Beneath, Bring Him to Me, and Scurry previously. The screenplay is also written by Luke Sparke, based on the sci-fi military novel by Ethan Pettus. It's produced by Carmel Imrie, Carly Sparke, and Luke Sparke. This hasn't premiered at any fests or elsewhere. Fathom & Rialto will debut Primitive War in US theaters starting August 21st, 2025 coming up this summer. Who's in? Scary? Find more posts in: Horror, Hype, Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
July 26, 2025
Source: YouTube

"My mission is to get my men home, not fight dinosaurs." Sparke Films & Rialto Distribution have debuted the full official trailer for a wild & crazy action thriller titled Primitive War, which is both a Vietnam War movie and a dinosaur movie all-in-one. "This ain't no walk in the park." This actually looks WAY bigger and better than it might seem, definitely not a B-movie, despite the possibility. Set in Vietnam in 1968. A recon unit known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. They soon discover they are not alone. There are dinosaurs of all kinds hiding out in this primordial valley. And it will take all they've got for them to make it out of there without becoming lunch. This dino action movie's cast has Ryan Kwanten, Jeremy Piven, Anthony Ingruber, Aaron Glenane, Tricia Helfer, Nick Wechsler, Ana Thu Nguyen, and Jake Ryan. Sparke states: "Dinosaurs in the Vietnam war? What's not to love about that concept?!" Now set for a theatrical release starting in August one month from now. This looks proper badass! They might've actually made a better Jurassic World movie. Fire it up.

Here's the main official trailer (+ poster) for Luke Sparke's movie Primitive War, direct from YouTube:

You can rewatch the first teaser trailer for Luke Sparke's Primitive War right here for the first look again.

Vietnam. 1968. A search and rescue team known as Vulture Squad is sent to an isolated jungle valley to uncover the fate of a missing Green Beret platoon. As they hunt the primordial depths of the valley, they discover ancient horrors that not only threaten to unravel their minds, but they will end their lives as well. Dinosaurs have somehow been unleashed...! When the casualties mount, the men of Vulture Squad must abandon their human nature and give in to their savage instincts in order to survive…the Primitive War. Primitive War is directed by B-movie genre filmmaker Luke Sparke, director of the movies Red Billabong, Occupation, Occupation: Rainfall, Devil Beneath, Bring Him to Me, and Scurry previously. The screenplay is also written by Luke Sparke, based on the sci-fi military novel by Ethan Pettus. It's produced by Carmel Imrie, Carly Sparke, and Luke Sparke. This hasn't premiered at any fests or elsewhere. Fathom & Rialto will debut Primitive War in US theaters starting August 21st, 2025 coming up this summer. Who's in? Scary?

Find more posts in: Horror, Hype, Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer
